website_summaries.verdict: A good value on a solid entry-level roller blade skate.
pros: Closure system provides a snug fit
cons: Some found these difficult to lace properly

customer_reviews.title: Good skates but why that buckle design
customer_reviews.text: Skate is fast and comfortable no complaints there.The skate buckles are the only drawback.Very difficult to get tight.On my old skates the plastic strap fed through the buckle and you would tighten it and the excess strap was outside the skate.These skates for so unknown reason the excess strap goes inside the boot.It jams up and results in a loose fit.To remedy this I cut an inch off each strap.Now the skates fit.Dumb feature on an otherwise good skate.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: You will love them I haven't had a pair in almost 20 years I am 35 :)
customer_reviews.text: I totally love these skates great ankle support. Wheels roll with no issues! I am a 9 1/2 in women. So I ordered a 8 in men's. They fit great if you plan to put inserts then get a 8 1/2 to be sure you have room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for the first time and shoe size to rollerblade size!
customer_reviews.text: Great rollerblades. Wore them once so far for about 6 miles and felt very comfortable for being the first time using them. I wear a 9.5 shoe so I was a little in between a 9 and a 10. I went with a 10 and there’s a little bit of room but it isn’t a problem. A 9 would likely be too tight so I believe I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sal D.

customer_reviews.title: Great skates.
customer_reviews.text: Great skates. Look great and feel very secure and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AGonzv

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: They’re very smooth and easy to ride. I’m a beginner and decided to start roller blading. While they’re fast and learning to stop takes some practice, I’d definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Salata

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sharp looking for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Really solid, true to shoe size, very smooth glide wheels, and they’re good looking compared to most rollerblades. I’d say very affordable for how high quality these actually are. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Go skates
customer_reviews.text: Great look and style. Fit well. Easy on and off
customer_reviews.author: patsy t

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after 2 weeks use
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last a month, and it's two days over my return window. I purchased these for my son. One the past month he's used them for about 2 weeks, the other 2 he was away without them. The buckle broke, wheels deteriorated, and the material has torn. Normal, casual use. I'm so disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: EtsySweaterTherapy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY GREAT PRICE BUY BUY BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: They are so nice I couldn't be happier I thought that there were going to be some flaws in them because they were used but seriously look and feel brand new if i would have to i would definitely order again don't listen to these Karen's out here writing bad reviews great purchase great buy thank you so much and as for shipping they arrived 3 days early once again thank you
customer_reviews.author: That ty guy

customer_reviews.title: Skate at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased these skates. Two weeks after purchase, I'm skating and nearly died, the wheel fell off and got stuck in the skate. Also, they won't replace the skate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My bf skates with these everyday. He skates super far too. Was definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedez b.

customer_reviews.title: Great In Line Skates
customer_reviews.text: Arrived much sooner than originally stated. Skate is very comfortable while providing a good amount of ankle support. Very impressed with the skate so far.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda biddle

customer_reviews.title: Great Blades
customer_reviews.text: These are nice smooth cruising blades. They are not high performance blades, but they will get you around the neighborhood in a nice smooth manner.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 10 stars based on shipping quickness and delivery alone, I would. I’m the worst about getting gifts bought on time 🙃 snagged these last minute for my husbands Father’s Day gift from the kids with an estimated date of 06/24. It showed up in less than 24 hours! Thank you! And the blades are great too. Husband is a 9.5, sized up to a 10. Little big but didn’t want to have them be too small. He can wear some thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rooke

customer_reviews.title: Descent blades
customer_reviews.text: Good skates. Only criticism is they could be tighter. Meaning the lace and the straps don’t quite tighten enough
customer_reviews.author: james Missig

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: They are decent, but Ive found skates that are just as good for a much lower price.
customer_reviews.author: kito

customer_reviews.title: Best Rollerblades for your money
customer_reviews.text: I never disliked them they are everything I wanted in rollerblades
customer_reviews.author: Jason chapman

customer_reviews.title: Nice and smooth
customer_reviews.text: It very smooth when you skate, it came in good condition, tho the laces where hard to figure out. Overall these are very good quality do recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rociel

product_meta.title: Rollerblade Zetrablade Elite Men's Adult Fitness Inline Skate, Black and Lime, Performance Inline Skates
product_meta.description: Zetrablade Elite is an entry-level-to-intermediate skate for men. The comfort-fit boot structure, upgraded mesh liner and 80 mm Performance/SG5 bearing combo are ideal for maintaining moderate speeds; wheels are upgradable to higher-performance with skater proficiency. A secure closure system combined with the monocoque frame lowers the center of gravity for increased stability. Zetrablade Elite is an exceptional value for advancing skaters.
feature_bullets: ENHANCED ENTRY-LEVEL TO INTERMEDIATE SKATE - Extra comfort and balance features for casual male skaters on a budget
HIGH CUFF FOR ADDED SUPPORT - Durable shell makes learning how to skate easier
COMFORT PERFORMANCE LINER & BREATHABLE UPPER - Extra padding, engineered mesh and speed-lacing/closure system for enhanced fit
MONOCOQUE FRAME - Durable frame for a lower center of gravity enhances stability
ROLLERBLADE PERFORMANCE WHEELS - 80mm/82A wheels and SG5 bearings for better wear and moderate speed
